name: Morning Dew By Alvin Ashcraft
description: One of my favorite aggregator blogs.  Mostly .Net related, but with great content in Design / Methodology areas

name: Math With Bad Drawings
description: While there hasn't been many posts in 2023, I go back and look at the archives for inspiration.  The way Ben takes difficult concepts and simplifies them with whiteboard drawings and concepts is remarkable.  Check out his book on Math games, it is fascinating.

name: Institute For Faith, Work & Economics
description: A great site for understand how faith and work co-exist.  Frequent content with a lot of food for thought.

name: I.M. Wright's "Hard Code"
description: More than just program management, the history in this blog has information that is core to the development of managers as well as insights for those leading in the technology spaces of this world.

name: JD Meier
description: Not just productivity, but rather a set of articles that are thought provoking, forward looking, and strategic.  I am always impressed by the depth of the information that is covered.
